name: crowdie
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a soft, fresh Scottish cheese: This delicious paté is a fantastic blend of native Scottish oak-smoked trout and organic crowdie. Crowdie is the best known of the Scottish fresh cheeses. Desserts included a crowdie cheesecake mousse with summer berries.
More examplesFewer examplesThis simple cheese preparation is known as crowdie, and has been around for many centuries.Crowdie is thick and firm, which distinguishes it from some other cottage cheeses.The pancakes were stuffed with smoked salmon, crowdie, and beetroot.
